noKnowledgePoints: No knowledge points yet, click the button above to add the first one
recallPlaceholder: Enter what you can recall here...
question: Question
questionPlaceholder: e.g., What is a binary function?
answerPlaceholder: Enter detailed explanation of the knowledge point...
useActiveRecall: Use active recall to deepen memory
continueAddNewPoints: Continue adding new knowledge points or wait for next review
welcomeDescription: Use spaced repetition and active recall to improve memory
confirmDeleteDescription: Deleting this knowledge point will also delete related review plans. This action cannot be undone.
editDescription: Modify the question and answer of the knowledge point
addDescription: Add a new knowledge point, the system will automatically schedule review plans
pointAdded: Knowledge point added! Review plan: in 1 day, 7 days, 16 days, 35 days
dataLoadFailed: Data loading failed, but you can continue using the app

metadata.title: Learning Assistant - Spaced Repetition and Active Recall
